name: Bastion
html: Bastion sentinels are battlefield leaders. They can easily turn the tides by calling out orders, inspiring troops, and synchronizing troop movements.

name: Battle Master
html: Battle masters use their barrier to execute unique maneuvers on the battlefield, controlling and harrying enemy forces.

name: Blackstar
html: Blackstars prefer controlling the battlefield over raw power. They can shape their biotic powers to avoid hurting friends and gain unique benefits to biotic control powers like Lift, Singularity, and Stasis.

name: Bloodhound
author: Helios
html: Nose to the ground, eye on the scanners, ears perked, all senses opened. Focusing on your surroundings, you make sure that whatever target you selected doesn't get away once you have its trail.

name: Cardinal
author: Tech Knight
html: In the tropical swamps towards the equator, the "Exalted Prophets" took residence within the swamps and became obsessed with the biotic beasts within, to the point of near worship, wanting the gifts of their power for themselves. Consuming these beasts for the majority of their lives have given them unique biotic traits, to the point of being able to summon weapons using their own biotic amps, their own ferocity making them stronger.

name: Commando
html: Commandos don't need heavy weapons because they ARE the heavy weapon. Their features improve both the damage potential and output of their biotic powers, making them a deadly force.

name: Disruptor
html: Disruptors have learned to tap into dark energy, improving biotic abilities that tear apart their adversaries from within. They also specialize in maintaining powers with intense focus.

name: Drone Jockey
html: A drone jockey forms a bond with their mechanical companion, giving it a body, name and increasing its potency on the battlefield.

name: Gladiator
html: Gladiators are pure-combatants, focused on winning at all costs and being nearly impossible to take down.

name: Guardian
html: Guardians support and buff party members by utilizing different AI packages from their Tech Armor ability and protecting them with their Omni-Shield. They're also one of the most skilled classes, gaining the Expertise feature twice.

name: Havoc
html: GUNS!!! GRENADES!!! EXPLOSIONS!!!

name: Juggernaut
html: Juggernauts are living tanks and nearly impossible to take down. Their tech armor upgrades make sure they can take a hit, or one hundred, without so much as a scratch.

name: Legionnaire
html: The Legionnaires, known to few outside of the colony as the "Legion of Judgement" became the police force that maintained order within the remains of the original colony after the main conflict ended. They rule with a fair but iron fist, organising hunts to find food for the colony at a regular interval, while the rest patrol the streets to keep the peace. Legionnaires would only leave if they got tired of the colony policing life, searching the stars for more glory and honour.

name: Mastermind
html: Masterminds are highly-intellectual and skilled individuals, using strategy and perfectly timed attacks to win in battle.

name: Medic
html: The name says it all. As a medic, you'll be one on the field that can dress a wound and get your comrades back into fighting shape.

name: Nemesis
html: Nemesis vanguards prefer distance and using biotic powers. While they lack the raw power of an adept, they're more crafty and harder to take down.

name: Outrider
author: Helios
html: Your favourite place during battle is on the back of a powerful beast. You rush through underbrush covered jungles and dangerous slippery ice fields with ease and you're always the first into the fray. You and your beast share this ideology of 'Get in, bring the pain, get out.'

author: Spageddy
name: Path of Cyber
html: The latest tech, the latest gadget, the latest advantage. You look for and develop creative new tools for your travels, and they give you the edge you need.

author: Spageddy
name: Path of Eezo
html: Your focus is on biotics and the manipulation of the world around you. You learn how to improve your biotics to truly make a your brain your most valuable tool.

author: Spageddy
name: Path of the Voidhopper
html:
You took the path of least resistance: the one which doesn't exist. As a Voidhopper, you focus your biotic prowess into the difficult yet awesome power of Blinking, rushing in between adversaries and leaving them confused as to your whereabouts.

Addendum: Whenever a feature of the Voidhopper states you need to move half your speed, it also means you cannot end your movement in the same square that you started in.

author: Spageddy
name: Path of War
html: You are an expert in armed combat and the use of machines of war. Your Path is rife with violence, but not without it's own beauities and discoveries.

name: Saboteur
html: Saboteurs are tech savvy infiltrators that use cloak and dagger tactics to control the outcome of battles.

name: Shadow
html: Shadow Infiltrators are melee specialists that make heavy use of their tactical cloak and stealth to close the distance between themselves and their target.

name: Shock Trooper
html: Shock troopers like to fight up close and personal, using charge to dash around the battlefield and ripping enemies apart with shotgun blasts.

name: Sniper
html: Snipers are ranged specialists that have an affinity for sniper rifles.

name: Stalker
author: Tech Knight
html: The last of the three factions that took residence within the most dangerous forests of Chasca - the "Night Stalkers" - looked to the location that had the most food and water within a short distance to sustain themselves for potentially many generations. The increased challenge of these creatures have given them many avenues to improve their hunting methods, using equipment and stealth to their advantage, up to the point of being able to attack and still remain hidden to strike again from the shadows.

name: Weapon Master
html: Weapon masters train extensively in the art of a single weapon, giving them powerful advantages when using a weapon of that type.
